live_updates: Power has been restored and services are back online. Thanks for your patience and understanding.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
59486.summary: Some customers in the Sullivan Heights area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59486.title: Mar 27 - Burnaby (Sullivan Heights) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
